author: Appeal-Democrat
title: Spring Training: Max Stassi hitting .300 | Sports | appeal-democrat.com
text:
Spring Training: Max Stassi hitting .300 Appeal-Democrat Mar 19, 2025 54 mins ago Comments Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email SCOTTSDALE, ARIZONA - FEBRUARY 14: Max Stassi #34 of the San Francisco Giants takes batting practice during Spring Training at Scottsdale Stadium on February 14, 2025 in Scottsdale, Arizona. (Photo by Andy Kuno/San Francisco Giants/Getty Images)
Andy Kuno/San Francisco Giants Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save Yuba City High product and former Gold Sox Max Stassi improved his average to .300 (6-20) Tuesday during a spring game for San Francisco. Stassi and the Giants will be at Sutter Health Park in West Sacramento on Sunday for an exhibition with the team’s triple-A affiliate, the River Cats. First pitch is set for 5:07 p.m. and the game is set to be broadcast on KMAX 31.
